snippet.title: chili pepper
snippet.description: Chili pepper Wikipedia Alternative forms chile pepper, chilli pepper Etymology chili +‎ pepper Noun

snippet.title: capsicum
snippet.description: edible peppers. The spicy fruit of the above plants, the bell peppers. Hyponyms (plants): cayenne pepper

snippet.title: Capsicum frutescens
snippet.description: Capsicum annuum or a variety of C. annuum; cayenne pepper. External links Capsicum frutescens on Wikipedia

snippet.title: Capsicum
snippet.description: Capsiceae - tribe Hyponyms (genus): Capsicum annuum (bell pepper, paprika, pimento etc), Capsicum baccatum, Capsicum
